name: Let Me Rest
description:
Let Me Rest is a game about belonging, grief and coping with loss. The home of someone can tell you more about them than they can in an entire lifetime. But what happens once you die? Well you still need a home. The home you lived in is just one of many, but there’s only one where you take your final rest.

Step into the shoes of an Undertaker. Choose to play as an empathetic human being or an arrogant money loving prick. Visit your client’s former home, learn about them, comfort their relatives and make sure their funeral service is what they would have wanted. Game-play involves exploring an isometric world, point and clicking, solving mini puzzles and navigating various dialogue options. What kind of Undertaker do you want to be?

This game was created during the Global Game Jam 2019
